text: Jean Paulo Campos (born April 13, 2003) is a Brazilian actor, singer and television presenter. He became known when playing Cirilo in the telenovela Carrossel. In 2014, he repeated the same role in the series Patrulha Salvadora. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !! Notes !!
